subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Isiah Thomas got a new job, an ultimatum and a one-year lease on his office at 2 Penn Plaza — his career and the Knicks' fate now inextricably intertwined.
snippet: Isiah Thomas got a new job, an ultimatum and a one-year lease on his office at 2 Penn Plaza — his career and the Knicks' fate now inextricably intertwined.
